      IShoppingCartElement CashRegister.selectProduct​(Product product)

    • Uses of Product in rbvs.product

      Subclasses of Product in rbvs.product 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CompositeProduct
      Provides the means to specify a Joint-Product that is a collection of containedProducts.
      class  ExtendedProduct
      Implementation of a product with with a name and price.
      class  SimpleProduct
      Implementation of a product that only consists of a single item with a name and price.

      Constructor Description
      CompositeProduct​(String name, float discount, Collection<Product> products)
